data.name: MClock_Note2
data.value: 1. Try to swip left/right on week, hour, minute, date, you can change the format or switch functions;

data.name: MClock_Note3
data.value: 2. Double click on Sunday you can change the first day of the week;

data.name: MClock_Note4
data.value: 3. On Timer page, you can swip up/down to change the default minutes;

data.name: MClock_Note5
data.value: 4. You can double click to start/pause the timer and triple click to stop it;
